explains: 【名】 （Mat）（英）马特，玛特（女名）（教名Matthew、Martha、Matilda的昵称），（土）马特，（柬）马（人名）
wordGroup: on the mat 受责备；受审问
straw mat 草席；蚕用草荐
bath mat 浴室脚垫；浴室防滑垫

sentences.en: Wipe your feet on the mat before you come in, please.
sentences.cn: 请在垫子上擦擦脚再进来。

sentences.en: Of course, you found your door-mat.
sentences.cn: 当然，你找到了你的擦脚垫。

sentences.en: Who ever heard of a door-mat TELLING anyone anything?
sentences.cn: 谁听说过擦脚垫能告诉人什么事？
